Issue.creator: ozheregelya
Issue.summary: CLI: Should display verkeys in abbreviated form if possible
Issue.description: seed= cid= metadata= Parameters are: did - (optional) Known DID for new wallet instance seed - (optional) Seed for creating DID key-pair cid - (optional) Create DID as CID (default false) metadata - (optional) DID metadata Examples: did new did new did=VsKV7grR1BUE29mG2Fm2kX did new did=VsKV7grR1BUE29mG2Fm2kX seed=00000000000000000000000000000My1 did new seed=00000000000000000000000000000My1 cid=true did new seed=00000000000000000000000000000My1 cid=true metadata=did_metadata {code} Â Need to add parameter to create did with abbreviated verkey. >
